General.Name: Aegean Airlines S.A.
General.Description: Aegean Airlines S.A., together with its subsidiaries, operates as an airline company that engages in the provision of public airline transportation services in Greece and internationally. It transports passengers and cargo through scheduled and non-scheduled flights; and offers aviation applications, aircraft technical support, and ground handling aircraft services. The company also offers charter flights; and imports, markets, and leases aircraft and spare parts. Aegean Airlines S.A. was incorporated in 1988 and is headquartered in Athens, Greece.
